text: @seanhannity Trump's personal financial interest in Sanofi, the French drugmaker that makes Plaquenil, the brand-name of hydroxychloroquine.  Hospitals in Sweden stopped providing the drug to treat COVID-19 after reports of adverse side effects. -When this is over, you too may end up in jail.
